mapper.sql: EVENT_NAME, EVENT_KEY, ID, EVENT_TIME, EVENT_DATA, EVENT_CONSUME_TIME

insert into HXD_EVENT_HISTORY
EVENT_NAME,
EVENT_KEY,
ID,
EVENT_TIME,
EVENT_DATA,
EVENT_CONSUME_TIME,

mapper.update:
update HXD_EVENT_HISTORY
ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
EVENT_TIME = #{eventTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVENT_DATA = #{eventData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_CONSUME_TIME = #{eventConsumeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where EVENT_NAME = #{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EVENT_KEY = #{eventKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
